name: Take Your Kids to Work Day
name_original: Take Your Kids to Work Day
description:
*PLAY IN FULL-SCREEN*

Help a packager worker at a candy factory the day everyone bring their kids to work. This game was created for Beginners Circle Jam #2. The theme of the GameJam was CANDY, and it lasted 2 weeks.

CONTROLS:

MOVE: Arrow keys / WASD

GRAB: Hold Left mouse click / RELEASE: Release Left mouse click

GAME RULES:

  • Distribute each candy to its box container within the time frame.
  • If you misplace a candy you will get one "X".
  • If you get 3 "X"s the level will restart. 
  • Recycling eaten candy and normal candy will provide gifts (Time extension or "X" removals).

[CREDITS]

Game developer:
Michael Todemann

Assets used:
Hustle by Kevin MacLeod
